website_summaries.verdict: An impressive brand name with even more impressive cooking capabilities.
pros: An instant classic that not only adds to your culinary ambition, but to your kitchen design as well
Made of durable, high-fired stoneware with glossy enamel glazing
Safe to use in the oven, microwave, or freezer
cons: We wish food would stick less to the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again and reorder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and brand. They are long lasting and all around amazing. I make the best Italian baked omelette using this item. I would recommend wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated but a great addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother and the dish is a wee bit smaller than I had hoped for. Never mind though as the color (cobalt in this case) is beautiful and the craftsmanship is untouchable. We immediately made a cauliflower gratin in the dish after receipt and it came out beautifully. In addition the dish looks great on the table. It's nice to have something that can go from oven to table with ease and good looks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice dish for smaller households
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good little gratin dish for smaller households and I am finding it very versatile for both baking and serving. It feels sturdy, is easy to clean, bakes evenly and the handles are perfectly designed for lifting even when wearing awkward oven mits. In addition to baking in it, I use it as a server for vegetables or rolls. And I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: R. Roorda

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Since my husband and I became empty nesters I have been looking for smaller cookware and serving pieces. This size was perfect for us. It holds 2 pieces of meat or whatever smaller quantity of anything I am cooking. Also love the red!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately did not order the same size but I am completely happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: I owned one of these au gratin dishes and recently broke it. I,unfortunately did not order the same size but I am completely happy with this one. I realized I didn't really need the larger size as it is PERFECT in my Cuisinart CSO-300.
customer_reviews.author: J ELLEN VONHOLTEN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset always a good investment. Beautiful AND useful. Also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite baking dish next to my 3 quart one, lol
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: I've Loved le Creuset for years!!!
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset puts out a quality product and, while not the cheapest on the market, it's still among my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dish
customer_reviews.text: This will be a wonderful addition to my daughter's collection of stoneware dishes. It's the perfect Christmas gift for her. And what lovely colors.
customer_reviews.author: Arrets

customer_reviews.title: Vive la France (of America)
customer_reviews.text: I have several sizes of these and love them all. Makes a nice presentation and cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dish!
customer_reviews.text: This dish is high quality and fun to use. It is not very big but that is what makes it fun.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in Half
customer_reviews.text: First time i used pan in oven it cracked in half. See pic attached. Description says oven safe. They are in process of sending another one.
customer_reviews.author: larry223

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my wife and me. Holds enough side dish with generally some leftovers. If you grease it first, it cleans easily. Looks nice on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Archer2010

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as broiler safe. Not so. Cracked into ...
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as broiler safe. Not so. Cracked into 4 pieces on my third use when it had been under broiler for less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Le creuset
customer_reviews.text: Catalog was deceiving. Item was wrong size. Will try to return. Too large. You need to be more specific as to the size on the item.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as always with Le Creuset
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as always with Le Creuset, unfortunately the dimensions that are indicated on the site are from the outside dimensions, handle to handle, not the interior dimensions. This would be good for maybe a chicken breast or 2 of they are small. Will re-buy are larger size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: They were much cheaper and not as pretty. A different brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after two other baking dishes broke. They were much cheaper and not as pretty. A different brand. I resisted paying more money for this baking dish, but I am glad that I did! Food doesn't stick to the surface the way it stuck to the other baking dishes and when there is a bit of food residue, a few minute soak with hot water and baking soda does the trick! The directions do state one should not soak the dish for long. It is also as pretty as it is functional, which adds another element of delight.
customer_reviews.author: Letters From Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset Heritage 1-QT Au Gratin Dish, Cherry
customer_reviews.text: The dish is very beautiful. I purchased the cherry color. The dish performs perfectly in the oven and clean up very easy. I will say the product sizing that Le Creuset uses is much to be desired. Most of the time they give the overall length instead of the actual capacity of the dish. It is difficult to determine if the size will work for its intended purpose. I am very satisfied with the product but the price is a bit ridiculous (so only 4 stars). But it is a top notch baking dish. Very happy with it and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Realist

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this dish.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dish for several years and it's so easy to clean. Nothing sticks to it. Bought two more for friends.
customer_reviews.author: MegAA

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: This is okay and good quality, but much much smaller than I expected. I kept it rather tha having the hassle of shipping it back. Please check the sizes to see if this is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to make dishes for two or smaller sides
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to make dishes for two or smaller sides. Great heat distribution and cleans up well, like all Le Creuset products we own.
customer_reviews.author: O.D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for many recipes although it became stained after a few uses
customer_reviews.author: GASPER FONTANA

customer_reviews.title: So pretty with your china set.
customer_reviews.text: It's Le Creuset quality and so pretty it can mix in with white bone china. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Berry

customer_reviews.title: Love these dishes
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect dishes for me, when I make a casserole or stew. With just two of us, I often wasted food, but I find that I can separate the food into two of these dishes and have frozen leftovers for another time.
customer_reviews.author: Bun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Three words: baked, stuffed, lobsters. Cooked to New Year's perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence E. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! It is beautiful and the perfect size for me. Very useful for a small family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ----maybe good for 4 small china man chicken wings
customer_reviews.text: Of course Le Creusete has made this , A must for every single pensioeneer. This was made for a mouse. You could not put two slices of ham and some brie without causing a fire---ridicuolously small. For a doll house!----maybe good for 4 small china man chicken wings. A true cook needs more room. Even for a dorm room cook, they would giggle,it may fit to eggs? well made though!
customer_reviews.author: j7general

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This dish is so lovely. It is quite large and everything I have made in it has come out beautifully. It is so easy to clean!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Broke in Half
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift off of my wedding registry. I religiously followed the instructions for cleaning and care of the dish, but it broke straight down the middle after two years.
customer_reviews.author: emerald_ibis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, and especially useful for small meals
customer_reviews.text: For our family of two, I find that this is a great size for 2-3 chicken breasts, or roasted vegetables, etc. I have only used it in the oven, and I have had no problems with that. I have put it in the dishwasher, but I tend to usually hand wash it. Baked-on food comes off easily, sometimes with a little scrubbing action needed. The cherry color is also very nice, and matches well with my other red Le Creuset pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

product_meta.title: Le Creuset Heritage Stoneware Oval Au Gratin Dish, 1-Quart, Cerise
product_meta.description:
Color:Cerise

LE CREUSET BAKEWARE: LE CREUSET HERITAGE STONEWARE 1-QUART OVAL AU GRATIN DISH, CHERRY
FROM INDULGENT DESSERTS AND HEARTY CASSEROLES TO FRESHLY BAKED BREADS AND MORE, LE CREUSET'S ASSORTMENT OF QUALITY BAKEWARE ENSURES PERFECT RESULTS FROM THE OVEN EVERY TIME.
Le Creuset stoneware dishes are versatile, multi-purpose designs that offer all the even-heating benefits of stoneware in a variety of shapes and capacities to fit nearly any baking, roasting or broiling recipe. Each dish features grooved handles for a sure grip, plus Le Creuset's glazed interior that protects against utensil damage, staining and odor absorption � making each dependable piece of stoneware easy to use and easy to count on.

 * High-quality exterior enamel protects against metal marks and other damage
 * Hard-wearing, impermeable finish fired at temperatures as high as 2192 degrees F is safe for cutting on with knives
 * Unmatched thermal resistance from -65 degrees F to 500 degrees F � safe for the freezer, microwave, oven, broiler and dishwasher
 * Less than 1% porosity, blocking moisture absorption which can lead to cracking, crazing and rippling along the interior
 * Unique clay mixture that creates a very dense material when fired, maintaining even temperatures and preventing scorching
 * Resistant to staining and flavor/odor absorption
 * A perfectly color-matched palette of bold, consistent tones for easy mixing and matching with other Le Creuset products

INTRODUCTION
All items in the Le Creuset stoneware range are original designs and have been hand-crafted, making each piece unique. Due to this uniqueness, there may be slight variations from piece to piece.

Le Creuset Stoneware is safe for use in the microwave, freezer, refrigerator, dishwasher, oven and broiler. The maximum oven-safe temperature is 500 degrees F / 260 degrees C.

The enameled surface is easy to clean and scratch-resistant. The enamel is completely hygienic and will not absorb odors or flavors. Le Creuset Stoneware is extremely strong and durable, and resists staining, chipping and cracking. The handles, knobs and rims have been designed for a secure, easy-to-hold grip.

CLEANING AND CARE
DO NOT use any Stoneware piece on the stovetop or any other direct heat source.

OVEN: Maximum oven-safe temperature is 500 degrees F / 260 degrees C. Use oven mitts for lifting at all times.

BROILER: When using under a broiler allow a gap of no less than 2-1/2 inches between the rim of the dish and the heat source.

MICROWAVE: Handles may become hot during prolonged microwave use, especially if the handles are enclosed with plastic wrap. Cover just the open top of the dish, leaving the handles exposed.

FREEZER-TO-OVEN USE: Do not place a frozen dish of food in a preheated oven. Place the frozen dish in a cold oven and set the temperature, allowing the dish and oven to heat together. Before serving always check that the center of the food is completely and uniformly hot.

CLEANING: Before the first use, wash the dish in hot, soapy water, and rinse and dry thoroughly. For most day-to-day cleaning, cool the dish for a few minutes before washing and drying, or wash in the dishwasher, allowing the full cycle to complete. Never leave a dish fully immersed in water. For removal of stubborn residues allow the dish to cool, fill with warm, soapy water and allow it to soak for 10 to 20 minutes. Wash in the usual way using a plastic brush or scouring pad if necessary.

Cream Catalana
feature_bullets: 1-quart oval au gratin dish made of high-fired stoneware
Non-porous enamel finish; resists odors, staining, chipping, and cracking
Traditional scalloped side handles help ensure a secure grip during transport
Dishwasher-safe; oven-safe up to 500 degrees F
